snippet: The officers died while carrying out an eradication campaign in a corner of the country where the government has struggled to stem cultivation.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, and Alissa J. Rubin from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The officers died while carrying out an eradication campaign in a corner of the country where the government has struggled to stem cultivation.

headline.seo: Contractor Killed on U.S. Base in Afghanistan
headline.main: Contractor Killed on a U.S. Base in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Contractor Killed on a U.S. Base in Afghanistan
